Class EmailController

  • java.lang.Object

public class EmailController

        @PostMapping(value="/sendPlainEmail")
public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> sendPlainEmail(@RequestBody
                                                                                                              PlainEmailDTO plainEmailDTO)
        Controller endpoint for sending plain text emails with or without attachments
        Parameters:
        plainEmailDTO - A DTO class with required fields. See PlainEmailDTO
        Returns:

      • checkStatusOfEmail

        @GetMapping(value="/checkStatus/{emailLogId}")
public java.lang.String checkStatusOfEmail(@PathVariable(value="emailLogId")
                                                                                          int logId)
        Controller endpoint for checking delivery status of an Email.
        Parameters:
        logId - ID returned when email was sent.
        Returns:
        Status of the email (DELIVERED OR NOT DELIVERED)
